title: Skill Context Window
description: Interactive visualization demonstrating the progressive disclosure principle for Claude Skills. Shows how skill components (frontmatter, SKILL.md file, and bundled resources) are loaded into context at different times to manage token efficiency.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: AI architecture
context window management
progressive disclosure
Claude skills
modular design
software architecture
prompt engineering
prerequisites: Basic understanding of AI language models
Familiarity with context windows and token limits

controls.description: Hover over each layer to see loading details

assumptions: Claude uses a three-level progressive disclosure system
Scripts can execute without loading into context
limitations: Does not show runtime context changes
